channel.title: Changing teleports, player respawn points, and log in location?
channel.description: well im changing my home location. i need to know how to change the teleport location for edgeville teleport and where players respawn when they die. also the spot where they log in at.

item.title: Changing teleports, player respawn points, and log in location?
item.dc:creator: @Chase2 Chase™
item.description:
@Chase2 wrote:

im trying to change my home teleport to edge… yes its in the varrock spot too

Read full topic

item.title: Changing teleports, player respawn points, and log in location?
item.dc:creator: @Chase2 Chase™
item.description:
@Chase2 wrote:

well i went into the clickingmost class and found the edgville teleport but not where to enter the x and y coords… i tryed changing log in but i cant find x and y coords for it either… same for the death…

Read full topic
item.source: Changing teleports, player respawn points, and log in location?

item.title: Changing teleports, player respawn points, and log in location?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Changing teleports would be located within the client class, though if you’re using DeltaScape it’s in your clickingMost class. Your player respawn points are in your youdied() method, and your login location is in your player class.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing teleports, player respawn points, and log in location?
